wherever.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to or at any place, position, or situation
wherever.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Children will play wherever they happen to be.
Dublin people dress more individually than people in London or wherever.
wherever.translation[0].definitions[1].e: She is shadowed by detectives wherever she goes.
I feel I ought to be nice to them wherever possible  (=at all times when it is possible).
wherever.translation[0].definitions[2].d: used at the beginning of a question to show surprise
wherever.translation[0].definitions[2].e: ‘Wherever did she find that?’ Daisy wondered.
